DOC.brief_summary: This minimal risk , anonymous , convenience sample , social behavioral study use qualitative descriptive survey method . It ascertain community member , physician , resident medical student perspective regard Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) infection , associate disease identify barrier prevent group ensure male 9-26 receive three-shot vaccine series prevent HPV infection . The research focus question : Do community member understand ease transmission HPV virus male 9-26 ? Do community member , physician , resident medical student knowledge associate disease may occur HPV virus infection male age 9-26 ? Do community member , physician , resident medical student know age male receive HPV vaccine three-shot series ? What barriers prevent community member physician , resident medical student ensure male 9-26 receive three-shot vaccine series prevent HPV infection ?
DOC.brief_title: Community Physician Perspectives Regarding Male Youth Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Disease Vaccination
DOC.detailed_description: This minimal risk , anonymous , convenience sample , social behavioral study use qualitative descriptive survey method . It ascertain community member , physician , resident medical student perspective regard Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) infection , associate disease identify barrier prevent group ensure male 9-26 receive three-shot vaccine series prevent HPV infection . The research focus question : Do community member understand ease transmission HPV virus male 9-26 ? Do community member , physician , resident medical student knowledge associate disease may occur HPV virus infection male age 9-26 ? Do community member , physician , resident medical student know age male receive HPV vaccine three-shot series ? What barriers prevent community member physician , resident medical student ensure male 9-26 receive three-shot vaccine series prevent HPV infection ?
DOC.criteria: Community Participants Inclusion All visitor Pediatric Internal Medicine University Health Shreveport Clinics willing complete survey Community Study Exclusion Those wish participate study Those English first language Clinical Faculty , Resident , Medical Student Study Inclusion All Louisiana State University Shreveport Health Clinical Faculty , Resident , Medical Student Inclusion willing complete online survey . Clinical Faculty , Resident , Medical Student Study Exclusion Any LSU Health Shreveport Clinical Faculty , Resident , Medical Student decline take survey attempt complete .
